newsitem.title: USA: CBOE, PHLX, AMEX set new equity options listings.
newsitem.headline: CBOE, PHLX, AMEX set new equity options listings.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) and the Philadelphia Stock Exchange (PHLX) said Tuesday they would begin trading options on shares of SpeedFam International Inc on February 24.
The American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said it would trade options on Advanced Fibre Communications Inc beginning February 19.
SpeedFam options would have opening strike prices of 35, 40 and 45, with initial expirations in March, April, July and October.
SpeedFam shares ended up 2-1/8 at 39 Tuesday.
At the PHLX, where Group One Ltd has been named specialist for the new options, position limits of 7,500 contracts have been set.
The SpeedFam options would trade in the Xilinx Inc trading crowd at the CBOE.
On the AMEX, Advanced Fibre options would open with strike prices of 40, 45 and 50, position limits of 7,500 contracts and initial expirations in March, April, June and September.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg has been named the specialist for Advanced Fibre options.
